logInConsole.doc: Property to decide if console logging is enabled

maxQueueSize.doc: Maximum message the queue can have

taskTimeoutInMinutes.doc: Timeout value after which the task has to be terminated

minLastReferenceSeenInDays.doc: Minimum days since we last saw a page. Pages older than this time will not be scanned.

pageRescanIntervalInDays.doc: Minimum days since we last scanned. Pages newer than this time will not be scanned.

failedPageRescanIntervalInHours.doc: Minimum hours since the last scan failed. Pages newer than this time will not be scanned.

maxScanRetryCount.doc: Maximum number of retries allowed for a page scan
